name: wl-impchain-com-1.1
comment: A degenerate form of antecedent swapping. The number '1' in the theorem name indicates that it handles a chain of length 1. Since there is just one antecedent in the chain, there is nothing to swap. Nondegenerated forms begin with ~ wl-impchain-com-1.2 , for more see there. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 7-Jul-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
